message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to you, and I believe it's a great value. I am offering it to you for $110. I hope you find this price attractive and decide to make the purchase.
I appreciate your offer, but I was hoping to get a better deal. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $105?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. I am willing to sell the product to you for $107, which is a slight increase from my previous offer. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $102?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to sell the product to you for $104. This is the best offer I can make, considering the value of the product and the current market conditions. I hope this proposal meets your expectations.
